Mahmood Ali-Balogun bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria, onye ọrụ omenala na onye isi njikwa Brickwall Communications Limited
Ọ duziri ihe nkiri nwetara ọtụtụ ihe nrite ' Tango With Me '
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Audio Visual Rights Society (AVRS) nke Nigeria (2)
Amụrụ Mahmood Ali-Balogun  n'abalị iri na iteghete nke ọnwa Julaị , 1959  ma tolite na ugwu Nigeria
Ọ bụ Alumnus nke University of Ife, akpọrọ ugbu a  Obafemi Awolowo University ebe ọ gụrụ Dramatic Arts nke ọkachamara kpọmkwem ya bụ na mmepụta fim na telivishọn

Ọrụ Mahmood etolitela kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ site na ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri,  ruo onye ntụzi aka,   onye na-emepụta ihe,  onye isi ụlọ ọrụ,   onye ana ajụta ese ihe gbasara ihe nkiri  na onye nnọchi anya na ụlọ ọrụ na-eme fim
